articles.author: Andrea Blanco, Reuters
articles.title: Lawmakers decry IRS plans to force Americans to submit to face-scanning technology - Daily Mail
articles.description: The measure has been met with criticism from lawmakers, who argue that the software is intrusive and inaccurate.
articles.content:
The US Treasury said on Friday it is considering alternatives to facial-recognition technology to verify identities for online taxpayer accounts after some lawmakers raised privacy concerns. 
The $8… [+4837 chars]
